mapper.insert: insert into board ( user_seq, title, content, reg_dt, read_count ) values ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0 )
insert into board_file ( board_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_uuid ) values ( #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUUID} )
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board b, users u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board b, users u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from board where title like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')
select file_uuid from board_file where board_id = #{boardId}
select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board b, users u where b.board_id = #{boardId} AND b.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ
select board_id, file_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_uuid, reg_dt from board_file where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into board_user_read ( board_id, user_seq ) values ( #{boardId}, #{userSeq} )
mapper.update: update board set read_count = read_count + 1 where board_id = #{boardId}
